question:
Consider the following statements about the Bank Board Bureau (BBB):
  1. It is an autonomous body set up to improve the governance of public sector banks (PSBs).
  2. It helps the banks in making strategies for capital raising and recommends candidates for the top post in public sector banks
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. It is an autonomous body set up to improve the governance of public sector banks. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The BBB helps banks in making strategies for capital raising and recommends the candidates for the top post in public sector banks. The Banks Board Bureau, which started to function in April 2016, was set up for a period of two years. Recently the government announced that it would revamp the structure of BBB in order to enhance its efficiency.
